description: This simple chicken and zucchini fettuccine in a garlic butter sauce is a quick and satisfying midweek meal option.
name: Garlic Butter Chicken Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving a couple of tablespoons of starchy water.

Melt the butter in a large pan on medium heat with the oil, add the chicken slices. Cook for 6 minutes, add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the lemon zest and zucchinis and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the pasta, starchy water as necessary, parsley and black pepper, toss well and cook for 1 minute to warm through. Serve with parmesan on top.
